message: This is a great opportunity to get a product at a steal! I'm offering it to you for just $100, which is a fantastic deal considering its usual market value. I'm sure you'll love it!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I trust your judgment and believe this could be a good purchase.

I'm glad you liked the previous product! This one is also a great deal, and I'm confident you'll be happy with it. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to get a product at an unbeatable price. Trust me, you won't find a better deal anywhere else!
Thank you for the offer, Alice, but based on the outcome of the last product, I think it's best if we move on to the next item.

I understand your hesitation, but I assure you that this product is a rare gem! It's a unique opportunity to get a product at an unbeatable price, and I'm willing to make a special exception for you. I'll even throw in a personalized guarantee: if you're not completely satisfied, I'll give you a full refund. What do you say?
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but given the past experiences, I think it's best to explore other options instead of accepting this one.

I understand your concerns, and I respect your decision to explore other options. However, I want to remind you that this product is a one-time offer, and I'm willing to make a special exception for you. I'll give you a chance to reconsider: if you buy this product now, I'll include a bonus gift worth $20. It's a unique opportunity to get an amazing deal, and I'm confident you won't find a better offer elsewhere. What do you say?
Thank you for the offer, Alice, but after careful consideration, I believe it's best to continue looking for the right product for me.

I'm glad you're being cautious, Bob! But I think you'll be pleasantly surprised by this next product. It's a top-of-the-line item, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm offering it to you for the same price as the previous products, $100, but I'm willing to throw in a premium service package worth $50. Thank you for the detailed offer, Alice. Considering the additional benefits, I think this could be a good investment for me.

Thank you for the enticing offer, Alice. Based on my positive experience with the last product, I think this one could be even better with the added features and customization options.
